timeline.message:
[CXF-8225] Structure send method of Slf4jEventSender

By extracting code into subroutines it is easier to override parts e.g. to make used Logger dependent of called method

timeline.author: reta

replies.bodyText: I can do it and thought about it (because it would be cleaner), but it has a little side effect: If there is an exception in the middle of the method fillMDC now the set MDCs are correctly reseted. If I return the keys, then not.
replies.author: bmaehr

replies.bodyText: Very valid point, we could separate prepare and populate (prepareMDC/populateMDC) steps but it looks like too much at this moment. LGTM, thank you!
replies.author: reta
